column4: I am dual-booting my machine with Ubuntu 9.10 and windows vista, re-installed the vista OS and GRUB loader is no longer working can anyone please advice how I can get the GRUB loader working so that I can access the Ubuntu 9.10

I am dual-booting my machine with Ubuntu 9.10 and windows vista, re-installed the vista OS and GRUB loader is no longer working can anyone please advice how I can get the GRUB loader working so that I can access the Ubuntu 9.10
I think you need to install a bootloader.
from windows, i don't know, you can reinstall Ubuntu but it will overwrite youre existing ubuntu
